00008 class item extends \InfiniteIterator {

00012     private $_data = array();

00031   /////////////////////////////////////////////////
00032   /// @brief construct a DAO
00033     ///////////////////////////////////////////////// 
00034   public function __construct($struct=array(), $data=array()) {   
00035     
00036     // if there's a struct 
00037     $this->_struct = ($struct ? $struct : $this->getStruct());  
00038     
00039     // added and modified
00040     if ( $this->_useAddedTimestamp === true ) {
00041       $this->_struct['added'] = array( 'type' => 'added' );
00042     }
00043 
00044     if ( $this->_useModifiedTimestamp === true ) {
00045       $this->_struct['modified'] = array( 'type' => 'modified' );             
00046     }
00047     
00048     // struct
00049     foreach ( $this->_struct as $key => $x ) {
00050       if ( !array_key_exists($key, $this->_data) ) {
00051         $this->_data[$key] = false;
00052       }
00053     }
00054 
00055         // set some sdata
00056         if (count($data) > 0) {
00057             $this->set($data);      
00058         }
00059     
00060   }
00061   
00062   
00063   /////////////////////////////////////////////////
00064   /// @brief MAGIC get a property from data array
00065   /// 
00066   /// @param name name of the property to get from
00067   ///        the data array
00068   /// @return value if property exists. false
00069   ///         if property does not exist
00070     /////////////////////////////////////////////////
00071   public function __get($name) {
00072 
00073         // data
00074         $data = array_merge($this->_data, $this->_adjunct);
00075 
00076     // check if it's something we need to expand
00077     if ( array_key_exists($name, $this->_expand) ) {
00078       
00079       // check if expand 0 is a function
00080       // if so we just execute it
00081       // instead of instanciating it
00082       if ( is_callable($this->_expand[$name][0]) ) {
00083       
00084         // call our get
00085         $data[$name] = call_user_func_array($this->_expand[$name][0], $this->_expand[$name][1]);              
00086       
00087       }
00088       else {
00089         
00090         // name
00091         $data[$name] = new $this->_expand[$name][0];
00092         
00093         // call our get
00094         call_user_func_array(array($data[$name], "get"), $this->_expand[$name][1]);       
00095         
00096       }
00097         
00098       // where to place it 
00099       ( array_key_exists($name, $this->_data) ? $this->_data[$name] = $data[$name] : $this->_adjunct[$name] = $data[$name] );
00100 
00101       // unset expandable
00102       unset($this->_expand[$name]);
00103       
00104     }
00105   
00106 
00107     // if it exists
00108     if ( array_key_exists($name, $data) ) {   
00109         
00110       // objectify
00111       if ( is_array($data[$name]) ) {
00112         return $this->objectify($data[$name]);
00113       }
00114       
00115       // plain
00116             return $data[$name];                    
00117             
00118     }
00119   
00120         // check for _
00121         else if ( mb_strpos($name,'_') !== false ) {
00122  
00123         // modifiers
00124         $modify = array(
00125           '_encode_' => function($v) { return htmlentities($v, ENT_QUOTES, "utf-8"); },
00126           '_decode_' => function($v) { return html_entity_decode($v, ENT_QUOTES, "utf-8"); },
00127           '_ucfirst_' => function($v) { return ucfirst($v); },
00128           '_toupper_' => function($v) { return strtoupper($v); },
00129           '_tolower_' => function($v) { return strtolower($v); },     
00130         );        
00131         
00132         foreach ( $modify as $str => $func ) {  
00133           if ( strpos($name, $str) !== false ) {
00134             return call_user_func($func, $data[str_replace($str, "", $name)]);
00135           }
00136         }
00137  
00138             // explode out 
00139             $parts = explode('_',$name);           
00140             
00141             // value
00142             $val = $data;
00143             $i = 0;
00144             
00145             // loop
00146       foreach ( $parts as $p ) {        
00147           
00148         // cur
00149         if ( is_object($val) AND $val->{$p} !== false ) {
00150           $val = $val->{$p};
00151         }
00152         else if ( is_array($val) AND isset($val[$p]) ) {
00153           $val = $val[$p];
00154         }
00155         else {
00156           $val = false; break;
00157         }
00158                 
00159       }
00160             
00161           // return
00162           return ( is_array($val) ? $this->objectify($val) : $val);
00163       
00164         }
00165         else if ( isset($this->{"_{$name}"}) ) {
00166           return $this->{"_{$name}"};
00167         }       
00168         
00169         // nope
00170         return false;
00171 
00172   }

00175   /////////////////////////////////////////////////
00176   /// @brief MAGIC set a property from data array
00177   /// 
00178   /// @param name name of the property to set in
00179   ///        the data array
00180   /// @param val value to set property to
00181   /// @return null
00182     ///////////////////////////////////////////////// 
00183   public function __set($name,$val) {
00184 
00185     // current
00186     $cur = $this->{$name};     
00187      
00188       // find some data 
00189     if ( array_key_exists($name, $this->_data)) {
00190       $this->_data[$name] = $val;
00191     }
00192       
00193         // check for _
00194         else if ( mb_strpos($name,'_') ) {
00195             
00196       // explode out 
00197             $parts = explode('_',$name);
00198             
00199             // set parts
00200             $ary = $parts[0];
00201             $key = $parts[1];
00202             
00203             // what
00204             if ( !isset($this->_data[$ary]) ) {
00205               $this->_data[$ary] = array();
00206             }
00207             
00208           // check if they want a key if the array
00209       if ( isset($parts[2]) ) {
00210         if ( !is_array($this->_data[$ary][$key]) ) {
00211           $this->_data[$ary][$key] = array();
00212         }
00213                         
00214             $this->_data[$ary][$key][$parts[2]] = $val;
00215           
00216       }
00217       else {
00218         // just return the array
00219         $this->_data[$ary][$key] = $val;        
00220       }
00221             
00222         }
00223         else {
00224           $this->_data[$name] = $val;
00225         }
00226         
00227     // add it 
00228     if ( isset($this->_trackChanges) AND $this->_trackChanges == true AND $val != $cur AND $name != 'changelog' ) {
00229       $this->_changes[$name] = array( 'new' => $val, 'old' => $cur );
00230     }
00231 
00232   }

00240   public function __toString() {
00241     return json_encode( $this->asArray() );

00245   /// @brief MAGIC call a function
00246   /// 
00247   /// @return mixed
00248     /////////////////////////////////////////////////   
00249     public function __call($name,$args) {
00250       
00251       // return
00252       $r = false;
00253       
00254       // what to return
00255       switch($name) {
00256       
00257              // short
00258                 case 'short':
00259                 
00260                   // conver arg 0 info value
00261                   $args[0] = $this->{$args[0]};
00262                        
00263           // ask b::short
00264           return call_user_func_array("b::short", $args);
00265                                 
00266                 // date
00267                 case 'date':
00268                 
00269                         // give r
00270                         $ts = $args[0];
00271                         $frm = (isset($args[1])?$args[1]:'m/d/Y');
00272                         
00273                                 // if not a ts
00274                                 if ( !$this->{$ts} ) {
00275                                         return false;
00276                                 }
00277                         
00278                         // give it 
00279                         return date($frm,$this->{$ts});
00280                         
00281         // ago
00282         case 'ago':
00283         
00284           return b::ago($this->{$args[0]});
00285                         
00286                 // decode
00287                 case 'decode':
00288                                 return html_entity_decode($this->{$args[0]},ENT_QUOTES,'utf-8');
00289                                 
00290                 // decode
00291                 case 'encode':
00292                                 return htmlentities($this->{$args[0]},ENT_QUOTES,'utf-8',false);
00293         
00294             // number
00295             case 'number':
00296               return number_format((int)$this->{$args[0]});
00297         
00298                 // pop
00299                 case 'push':
00300                         
00301                         // get some stuff
00302                         $ary = $this->{$args[0]};
00303                         $val = $args[1];
00304                                 $key = (isset($args[2])?$args[2]:false);
00305                         
00306                         // if ary === false we assume it's just empty
00307                         if ( $ary === false ) {
00308                                 $ary = array();
00309                         }
00310                         
00311                         // is object
00312                         if ( is_object($ary) AND method_exists($ary,'asArray') ) {
00313                                 $ary = $ary->asArray();
00314                         }
00315                         
00316                                 // need it to be an array
00317                                 if( !is_array($ary) ) {
00318                                         return false;
00319                                 }
00320                 
00321                         // add it
00322                                 if ( $key ) {
00323                                         $ary[$key] = $val;
00324                                 }
00325                                 else {
00326                                         $ary[] = $val;
00327                                 }
00328                                 
00329                                 // reset
00330                                 $this->{$args[0]} = $ary;
00331                                 
00332                                 // return array
00333                                 return $ary;
00334                         
00335                 // keyed arary
00336                 case 'keyArray':
00337                         
00338                         // field
00339                         $val = $args[0];
00340                         $key = (isset($args[1])?$args[1]:'id');
00341         
00342                         // opts
00343                         $array = array();
00344                         
00345                         // loop
00346                         foreach ( $this->_items as $itm ) {
00347                                 $k = $itm->$key;
00348                                 $v = $itm->$val;
00349                                 $array[$k] = $v;
00350                         }
00351                         
00352                         return $array;  
00353                         
00354         // shuffle
00355         case 'shuffle':
00356           
00357           // get the array
00358           if ( isset($args[0]) ) {
00359             
00360             // get the array
00361             $ary = $this->{$args[0]};
00362             
00363             // is it an object
00364             if ( is_object($ary) ) {
00365               $ary = $ary->asArray();
00366             }
00367             
00368             // is an array
00369             if ( is_array($ary) ) {
00370               shuffle($ary);
00371             }
00372   
00373             return new DaoMock($ary);
00374           
00375           }
00376           else {
00377           
00378             // shuffle
00379             shuffle($this->_items);         
00380             
00381             // give it 
00382             return $this;
00383           
00384           }
00385 
00386         // filter
00387         case 'filter':
00388           
00389           // key and value
00390           $key = str_replace(".", "_", $args[0]);
00391           $val = $args[1];
00392           $fa = (isset($args[2]) ? $args[2] : false);
00393           
00394           // loop through our items
00395           // and start picking out what doesn't match
00396           foreach ( $this->_items as $k => $item ) {                      
00397             if ( is_callable($val) ) {
00398               if ( !call_user_func($val, $item->{$key}, $fa) ) {
00399                 unset($this->_items[$k]);
00400                 $this->_total--;            
00401               }
00402             }           
00403             else if ( $item->{$key} != $val ) {
00404               unset($this->_items[$k]);
00405               $this->_total--;
00406             }         
00407           }
00408           
00409           // return just in case they want it that way also
00410           return $this->_items;
00411         
00412           break;
00413                         
00414         // in or inarray
00415         case 'in':
00416         case 'inarray':
00417         case 'in_array':
00418           
00419           return in_array($args[0], $this->_items);
00420                         
00421         // slice
00422         case 'slice': 
00423           
00424         
00425           // is 0 the name or a number
00426           if ( is_array($this->{$args[0]}) ) {
00427             return array_slice($this->{$args[0]}, $args[1], $args[2]);
00428           }
00429           else if ( is_array($this->_items) ) {
00430             
00431             // slice  
00432             $this->_items = array_slice($this->_items, $args[0], $args[1]);
00433           
00434             // return this
00435             return $this;
00436           
00437           }
00438         
00439           break;
00440                         
00441                 // unset
00442                 case 'unset': 
00443                         
00444                         $ary = $this->{$args[0]};
00445                         $key = (isset($args[1])?$args[1]:false);
00446                         
00447                         // is it an array
00448                         if ( !is_array($ary) ) { return $ary; }
00449                 
00450                         // unset it 
00451                         if ( $key  ) {
00452                                         unset($ary[$key]);
00453                         }
00454                         else {
00455                                         $ary = false;
00456                         }
00457                 
00458                         // reset
00459                         $this->{$args[0]} = $ary;
00460                 
00461                         // return
00462                         return $ary;
00463           
00464           // possessive
00465           case 'possessive':
00466             
00467             // val
00468             $val = $this->{$args[0]};
00469             
00470             // return
00471             return $val . (substr($val,-1)=='s'?"'":"'s");
00472       
00473       };
00474     
00475     }

00483     return $this->_data;

00487   /////////////////////////////////////////////////
00488   /// @brief default set action
00489   ///
00490   /// @param $data array of data to set 
00491   /// @return void
00492   /////////////////////////////////////////////////
00493   public function set($data){
00494     
00495     // needs to be an array
00496     if ( !is_array($data) ) { return; }
00497     
00498     // loaded
00499     $this->_loaded = true;
00500     
00501     // data 
00502     $this->_data = $data;           
00503       
00504     // normalize
00505     array_walk($data, array($this, '__mapSet'), $this->_struct);                      
00506                 
00507     // give back data
00508     foreach ($data as $key => $val ) {
00509       $this->_data[$key] = $val;
00510     }   
00511     
00512   }

00514     // map normalized strucs
00515     private function __mapSet(&$item, $key, $struct) {
00516                 
00517       // struct
00518       if ( isset($struct[$key]) ) {
00519   
00520         // children
00521         if ( isset($struct[$key]['children']) AND is_array($item) ) {
00522           array_walk($item, array($this, '__mapSet'), $struct[$key]['children']);
00523         }
00524         else {
00525           $item = call_user_func(array($this, '__mapSetFunc'), $struct[$key], $item, $key);       
00526         }
00527           
00528       }   
00529     
00530     }
00531 
00532     // the validate function
00533     private function __mapSetFunc($info, $value, $key) {      
00534           
00535             // based on data type do the transform
00536             if ( isset($info['type']) ) {
00537                 
00538                 // which type
00539                 switch ($info['type']) {
00540                 
00541                     // json we need to decode
00542                     case 'json':                             
00543                     
00544                         $value = ( is_array($value ) ? $value : json_decode($value,true) ); 
00545                         if ( is_null($value) ) {
00546                           $value = false;
00547                         }
00548                         break;
00549                     // tags need to be turned into
00550                     // a tags array
00551                     case 'tags':                       
00552                       $this->_expand[$key] = array("\\dao\\tags", array($value)); break;
00553                         
00554           // user
00555           case 'user':
00556                       $this->_expand[$key] = array("\\dao\user", array($value)); break;
00557                         
00558                     // dao
00559                     case 'dao':
00560                     
00561                       // class
00562                       $cl = "\\dao\\{$info['class']}";
00563                       
00564                       // args
00565                       $args = p('args', array(), $info);
00566                       
00567                           // args
00568                           if ( is_array($args) ) {
00569                             foreach ( $args as $k => $a ) {
00570                               if ( substr($a,0,1) == '$' ) {
00571                                 $i = substr($a,1);
00572                                 $args[$k] = $this->{$i};
00573                               }
00574                             }
00575                           }
00576                           else {
00577                             if ( substr($args,0,1) == '$' ) {
00578                               $i = substr($args,1);
00579                               $args = $this->{$i};
00580                             }                           
00581                           }
00582                             
00583                           // add to expand
00584                           $this->_expand[$key] = array($cl, $args);
00585                       
00586                       // stop
00587                       break;
00588                                                     
00589                         
00590                         
00591 /*
00592                     // tags need to be turned into
00593                     // a tags array
00594                     case 'tags':                            
00595                         $value = new \dao\tags('set',$value); break;
00596                         
00597           // user
00598           case 'user':
00599             $value = new \dao\user('get', array($value)); break;
00600                         
00601                     // dao
00602                     case 'dao':
00603                    
00604

00606                       $cl = "\\dao\\{$info['class']}";

00614                               if ( substr($a,0,1) == '$' ) {
00615                                 $i = substr($a,1);
00616                                 $args[$k] = $obj->{$i};
00617                               }
00618                             }

00635                         $value = $o; break;

00638                         
00639                     
00640                     // datetime
00641                     case 'timestamp':
00642                       
00643                       // if no value
00644                       if ( !$value ) { break; }                        
00645                       
00646                       // break
00647                       break;
00648                       
00649                     
00650                 }
00651                                    
00652             }
00653             
00654             return $value;

00658   /////////////////////////////////////////////////
00659   /// @brief normalize the data for insert
00660   ///
00661   /// @return array
00662   ///////////////////////////////////////////////// 
00663   public function normalize() {
00664   
00665     // data
00666     $data = $this->_data;       
00667       
00668     // normalize
00669     array_walk($data, array($this, '__mapNormalize'), $this->_struct);      
00670       
00671     // give back data
00672     return $data;   
00673   
00674   }
00675   
00676     // map normalized strucs
00677     private function __mapNormalize(&$item, $key, $struct) {
00678       
00679       // the validate function
00680       $validate = function($info, $value, $key, $p) {      
00681               
00682               // based on data type do the transform
00683               if ( isset($info['type']) ) {
00684                   
00685                   // which type
00686                   switch ($info['type']) {
00687                   
00688                     // uuid
00689             case 'uuid':
00690               if ( !$value ) { $value = b::getUuid(); } break;
00691               
00692             // user
00693             case 'user':
00694               $value = (is_object($value)?$value->id:$value); break;
00695                    
00696                       // json we need to decode
00697                       case 'json': 
00698                           $value = json_encode($value); break;
00699                           
00700                       // tags need to be turned into
00701                       // a tags array
00702                       case 'tags':                            
00703                           $value = (string)$value; break; 
00704                           
00705                       // dao
00706                       case 'dao':
00707                         if ( is_object($value) ) {
00708                           $id = p('id','id',$info);                             
00709                 $value = $value->{$id}; 
00710               }
00711               break;
00712               
00713             // timestsamp
00714             case 'timestamp':
00715             
00716                         // check user for a tzoffset
00717                   $u = Session::getUser();
00718                   
00719                   // offset
00720                   if ( $u AND $u->profile_tzoffset ) {
00721                     $value -= $u->profile_tzoffset;
00722                   }             
00723             
00724               break;
00725               
00726             // added
00727             case 'added':
00728               if ( $value === false ) {
00729                 $value = b::utctime();
00730               }             
00731               break;
00732               
00733             // modified
00734             case 'modified':
00735               $value = b::utctime(); break;
00736               
00737             // changelog
00738             case 'changelog':
00739               $value = $p->_changes; break;
00740                       
00741                   };
00742                   
00743               }
00744               
00745               // is deafult
00746               if ( isset($info['default']) AND $value === false ) {
00747                 $value = $info['default'];
00748               }
00749               
00750               // cast
00751               if ( isset($info['cast']) ) {
00752                 settype($value, $info['cast']);
00753               }
00754               
00755               return $value;
00756               
00757       };      
00758       
00759       // struct
00760       if ( isset($struct[$key]) ) {
00761     
00762         // validate
00763         $item = $validate($struct[$key], $item, $key, $this);
00764   
00765         // children
00766         if ( isset($struct[$key]['children']) AND is_array($item) ) {
00767           array_walk($item, array($this, '__mapNormalize'), $struct[$key]['children']);
00768         }
00769           
00770       }   
00771     
00772     }
00773 
00774   /////////////////////////////////////////////////
00775   /// @brief turn an array into an object
00776   ///
00777   /// @param array the array to turn into an object
00778   /// @return stdclass object
00779   ///////////////////////////////////////////////// 
00780   private function objectify($array) {
00781   
00782     if(!is_array($array)) { return $array; }
00783       
00784     $object = new DaoMock();
00785     if (is_array($array)) {
00786       foreach ($array as $name => $value) {
00787             $object->$name = $this->objectify($value);
00788       }
00789         return $object; 
00790     }
00791       else {
00792         return false;
00793       }
00794 
00795 
00796   }   
00797   
00798   
00799   /////////////////////////////////////////////////
00800   /// @brief print object as an array
00801   ///
00802   /// @param key return only single key as array
00803   /// @return data object value as array
00804   ///////////////////////////////////////////////// 
00805   public function asArray($adjunct=false) {
00806   
00807     // get the scheme
00808     $resp = array();
00809     
00810     // item type
00811     if ( count($this->_struct) > 0 ) {
00812         
00813       // loop through the struct
00814       foreach ( $this->_struct as $key => $info ) {
00815         
00816         // val
00817         $val = $this->__get($key);
00818         
00819         // see if it's a dao type
00820         // if it is we need to expand
00821         if ( isset($info['type']) AND in_array($info['type'],array('dao','user','tags')) ) {
00822           $resp[$key] = $val->asArray();
00823         }
00824         else if ( is_object($val) AND method_exists($val, "asArray") ) {
00825           $resp[$key] = $val->asArray();
00826         }
00827         else {
00828           $resp[$key] = $val;
00829         }
00830       
00831       }
00832     
00833     
00834       // adjunct 
00835       if ( $adjunct ) {
00836         foreach ( $this->_adjunct as $key => $val ) {
00837           if ( is_object($val) AND method_exists($val, "asArray") ) {
00838             $resp[$key] = $val->asArray();
00839           }
00840           else {
00841             $resp[$key] = $val;
00842           }       
00843         }
00844       }
00845       
00846     }
00847     
00848     // list type
00849     else {
00850     
00851       // loop through each item and add to object
00852       foreach ( $this->_items as $key => $item ) {
00853         $resp[$key] = $item->asArray();
00854       }
00855     
00856     }
00857     
00858     // give back the clean array
00859     return $resp;
00860   
00861     
00862   }
00863   
00864   
00865   /////////////////////////////////////////////////
00866   /// @brief get data array
00867   /// 
00868   /// @return data aray;
00869   /////////////////////////////////////////////////
00870   public function getData() {
00871     return $this->_data;
00872   }
00873   
00874   
00875   /////////////////////////////////////////////////
00876   /// @brief get schema array
00877   /////////////////////////////////////////////////
00878   public function getSchema() {
00879     return $this->schema;
00880   }     
00881 
00882 }
